\titleformat{\paragraph}
{\normalfont\normalsize\bfseries}{\theparagraph}{0.5em}{}
\titlespacing*{\paragraph}
{0pt}{2.25ex plus 1ex minus .2ex}{0.5ex plus .2ex}

\titleformat{\subparagraph}
{\normalfont\normalsize\bfseries}{\thesubparagraph}{0.5em}{}
\titlespacing*{\subparagraph}
{0pt}{2.25ex plus 1ex minus .2ex}{0.5ex plus .2ex}

% for not numbering in algorithm lines

\newcommand{\nonl}{\renewcommand{\nl}{\let\nl\oldnl}}% Remove line number for one line

%------------------------------------- NEw


% Redefine theorem style to remove space before definitions
\makeatletter
\def\thm@space@setup{%
  \thm@preskip=0pt
  \thm@postskip=0pt
}
\makeatother

% Define theorem environment
\theoremstyle{definition}
\newtheorem{defn}{Definition}[section]
